Package fr.univrouen.stb23v1.service

Interface ISTBService

All Known Implementing Classes:
STBService
public interface ISTBService
This services helps you to handle the STBs.

  • Method Details

    • getAllSTBs

      Iterable<STB> getAllSTBs()
      Returns:
      All the STBs from the database.

    • getSTB

      STB getSTB(Integer id) throws FunctionalException
      Returns the STB associated to the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The STB ID.
      Returns:
      The STB associated to this ID.
      Throws:
      FunctionalException - Exception thrown if the given ID is invalid.

    • getSTBAsHTML

      String getSTBAsHTML(Integer id) throws FunctionalException
      Returns the STB associated to the given ID on an HTML format.
      Parameters:
      id - The STB ID.
      Returns:
      The STB associated to this ID, as an HTML string.
      Throws:
      FunctionalException - Exception thrown if the given ID is invalid or if the STB can't be converted.

    • stbSummariesToHTML

      String stbSummariesToHTML(STBSummariesDTO stbSummaries) throws FunctionalException
      Transform the given STB summaries to an HTML view.
      Parameters:
      stbSummaries - The STB summaries.
      Returns:
      The HTML view of the summaries.
      Throws:
      FunctionalException - Exception thrown if the STB can't be converted.

    • insertSTBFromString

      STB insertSTBFromString(String stbString) throws FunctionalException
      Insert the given string STB into the database.
      Parameters:
      stbString - The XML STB string.
      Returns:
      The inserted STB.
      Throws:
      FunctionalException - Exception thrown if the given STB is invalid or duplicated.

    • deleteSTB

      STB deleteSTB(Integer id) throws FunctionalException
      Deletes the STB associated to the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The STB ID.
      Returns:
      The deleted STB.
      Throws:
      FunctionalException - Exception thrown when the given ID is invalid.
